DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between Two Fertility Protocols Obese Polycystic Ovary Syndrome Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study compare two fertility protocol obese woman Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome candidate In Vitro Fertilization ( IVF ) . These protocol carry less risk ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome woman may experience.The patient IVM group exposeD gonadotropin treatment control ovarian hyperstimulation . In antagonist group use GnRH agonist induce ovulation may reduce risk ovarian hyperstimulation .
